title: MD
biography: Ravi P. Agarwal was an Indian mathematician, Ph.D. sciences, professor, professor & chairman, Department of Mathematics Texas A&M University-Kingsville, Kingsville, U.S. Agarwal is the author of over 1000 scientific papers as well as 30 monographs. He was previously a professor in the Department of Mathematical Sciences at Florida Institute of Technology.
aiSummary: S. P. Agarwal is a health administration specialist with an H-index of 110 at Public Health (Faculty). Has been published in New England Journal of Medicine, Science, Nature Genetics. Based in India.
